Name: CABIN & SUIT PSI CHECK
checklistText:
<size=21>SYSTEMS & MONITORING CHECKS
Cabin and suit pressure check</size>
If cabin press >5.3:
	02 flow - 0.2 lb/hr
If 4.7 < cabin press < 5.3
	O2 flow - pegged lo or hi,  ~0.7 lb/hr stable
EMERG CABIN PRESS vlv - BOTH
SUIT CKT RET vlv - open (pull)
Remove helmet and gloves and stow in PGA bag
